com.revature.sms.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.sms.controllers.UserController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/v1/user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Server-side controller to handle User CRUD operations (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete)

    • Method Detail

      • createUser

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Object createUser(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                        UserDTO userDTO)
        To create user
        Parameters:
        token - Authorization token to make sure the user of the method has appropriate access to run the command
        userDTO - User Data Transfer Object that carries user information
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity object containing the newly created user object if it succeeds, or an error if there was a problem while creating the user

      • updateUser

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Object updateUser(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                         UserDTO userDTO)
        To update user info
        Parameters:
        token - Authorization token to make sure the user of the method has appropriate access to run the command
        userDTO - User Data Transfer Object that carries only the new information to be updated
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity object containing the updated user object if it succeeds, or an error if there was a problem while updating the user

      • retrieveUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/{username}",
                method=GET,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Object retrieveUser(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String username)
        To retrieve a given user based on their username
        Parameters:
        token - Authorization token to make sure the user of the method has appropriate access to run the command
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity object containing the requested user object if it succeeds, or an error if there was a problem while retrieving the user

      • retrieveAll

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Object retrieveAll(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String token)
        To retrieve all users
        Parameters:
        token - Authorization token to make sure the user of the method has appropriate access to run the command
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity object containing a list of the user objects if it succeeds, or an error if there was a problem while retrieving the users

      • deleteUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/{username}",
                method=DELETE,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Object deleteUser(@RequestHeader(value="Authorization")
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String username)
        To delete a given user based on their username
        Parameters:
        token - Authorization token to make sure the user of the method has appropriate access to run the command
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity object containing the ID of the user that was deleted if it succeeds, or an error if there was a problem while retrieving the users

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(java.lang.String tokenString)
        To validate the token from the request and set the user role
        Parameters:
        tokenString - String containing the actual auth token
        Returns:
        Boolean, true if token is valid, false if not

        To verify superAdmin role
        Parameters:
        role - String with the role name
        Returns:
